      • retrievePaymentAccount

        public PaymentAccountData retrievePaymentAccount(String paymentAccountUri,
                                        boolean includeMetaData)
        Description copied from interface: IPaymentAccountManagerFacade
        Retrieve payment account.

        Note:To get the latest account balance information, use the IPaymentAccountManagerFacade.refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String) method. Returned PaymentAccountData from this method may not contain the latest account balance information.
        Specified by:
        retrievePaymentAccount in interface IPaymentAccountManagerFacade
        Parameters:
        paymentAccountUri - the payment account uri
        includeMetaData - the include meta data
        Returns:
        the payment account data
        See Also:
        PaymentAccountData
